patched_yaml:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nodehelloworld.example.com
  labels:
    app: helloworld
spec:
  containers:
  - name: k8s-demo
    image: diyblockchain/k8s-demo:stable
    ports:
    - name: nodejs-port
      containerPort: 3000
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      privileged: false
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nodehelloworld.example.com
  labels:
    app: helloworld
spec:
  containers:
  - name: k8s-demo
    image: diyblockchain/k8s-demo:stable
    ports:
    - name: nodejs-port
      containerPort: 3000
    securityContext:
      readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      privileged: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nodehelloworld.example.com
  labels:
    app: helloworld
spec:
  containers:
  - name: k8s-demo
    image: diyblockchain/k8s-demo:stable
    ports:
    - name: nodejs-port
      containerPort: 3000
    securityContext:
      runAsNonRoot: true
      privileged: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nodehelloworld.example.com
  labels:
    app: helloworld
spec:
  containers:
  - name: k8s-demo
    image: diyblockchain/k8s-demo:stable
    ports:
    - name: nodejs-port
      containerPort: 3000
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 128Mi
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 256Mi
    securityContext:
      privileged: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

    resources:

        cpu: 100m

        cpu: 500m
        memory: 256Mi
    securityContext:
      privileged: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostnamespaces0
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause:stable
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      privileged: false
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause:stable
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      privileged: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
